Package io.crums.sldg.packs

Class EntryPackBuilder

java.lang.Object
io.crums.sldg.packs.EntryPackBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
io.crums.io.Serial, EntryBag
public class EntryPackBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements EntryBag, io.crums.io.Serial
Builds an EntryPack. Also, the serial form of this class is used to save and load these entry packs.
See Also:
EntryPack.load(ByteBuffer)

    • addAll

      public int addAll​(EntryPack bag, boolean overwrite)
      Adds all the entries in the given bag.
      Parameters:
      overwrite - if true, then existing entries are overwritten. Defaults to false in overload.
      Returns:
      the number of entries added

    • setEntry

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the previous entry if any.
